chalhoub.com>; Yara Baghdad <Yara.Baghdad@chalhoub.com>; Rawan Albina <Rawan.Albina@chalhoub.com>; Tarneem Mohamed <Tarneem.Mohamed@chalhoub.com>; Krastin Draganov <Krastin.Draganov@puigme.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-02 13:28
Subject: Giving and Receiving Training - October
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Hope you are well.

 

Research has shown that when done right, feedback has the power to transform performance by 39%. This fantastic feedback (constructive or otherwise) requires the right type of preparation, delivery, and in-the-moment management to ensure its full value is realized. Also to seek feedback proactively (and knowing how to make the most of what you hear), means you'll never dread receiving it again.

 

We are pleased to inform that you have been nominated to attend the Giving & Receiving Feedback workshop. The dates for the upcoming sessions are below for your information. Please choose which session is more convenient for you and respond to @MaryAnn Derequito <mailto:Maryann.Derequito@chalhoub.com>  or @Francesca Ortaliz <mailto:Francesca.Ortaliz@chalhoub.com>  with your selected date latest 4th October 2024. Kindly note that there are limited seats available for each session and we can only accommodate max of 35 attendees per session. We will be releasing additional sessions soon in case you will miss the below dates.

 

SESSION 1: October 10, 2024 ; 12pm – 3pm (UAE Time)

SESSION 2: October 28, 2024 ; 10am – 1pm (UAE Time)

Delivery Mode: Zoom (Online)

 

We look forward to receiving your preferred date to attend the training.

Subject: RE: Giving and Receiving Training - October 
 

Dear All,

 

Following the below email, please find additional date for your reference. Please send your preferred date to @MaryAnn Derequito <mailto:Maryann.Derequito@chalhoub.com>  or @Francesca Ortaliz <mailto:Francesca.Ortaliz@chalhoub.com>  latest 4th October 2024.

 

SESSION 1: October 10, 2024 ; 12pm – 3pm (UAE Time)

SESSION 2: October 28, 2024 ; 10am – 1pm (UAE Time)

SESSION 3: October 21, 2024 ; 10am – 1pm (UAE Time)

 

With you @ Heart

Sent: Wednesday, October 2, 2024 1:28 PM
Cc: Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com>; Yara Baghdad <Yara.Baghdad@chalhoub.com>; Rawan Albina <Rawan.Albina@chalhoub.com>; Tarneem Mohamed <Tarneem.Mohamed@chalhoub.com>; Krastin Draganov <Krastin.Draganov@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Giving and Receiving Training - October

 

Dear All,

 

Hope you are well.

 

Research has shown that when done right, feedback has the power to transform performance by 39%. This fantastic feedback (constructive or otherwise) requires the right type of preparation, delivery, and in-the-moment management to ensure its full value is realized. Also to seek feedback proactively (and knowing how to make the most of what you hear), means you'll never dread receiving it again.

 

We are pleased to inform that you have been nominated to attend the Giving & Receiving Feedback workshop. The dates for the upcoming sessions are below for your information. Please choose which session is more convenient for you and respond to @MaryAnn Derequito <mailto:Maryann.Derequito@chalhoub.com>  or @Francesca Ortaliz <mailto:Francesca.Ortaliz@chalhoub.com>  with your selected date latest 4th October 2024. Kindly note that there are limited seats available for each session and we can only accommodate max of 35 attendees per session. We will be releasing additional sessions soon in case you will miss the below dates.

SESSION 2: October 28, 2024 ; 10am – 1pm (UAE Time)

Delivery Mode: Zoom (Online)

 

We look forward to receiving your preferred date to attend the training. Further details related to the workshop will be sent to you once we received your confirmation.

 

With you @ Heart

chunks.text:
b.com>; Rawan Albina <Rawan.Albina@chalhoub.com>; Tarneem Mohamed <Tarneem.Mohamed@chalhoub.com>; Krastin Draganov <Krastin.Draganov@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Giving and Receiving Training - October 
 

Dear All,

 

Hope you are well.

 

Research has shown that when done right, feedback has the power to transform performance by 39%. This fantastic feedback (constructive or otherwise) requires the right type of preparation, delivery, and in-the-moment management to ensure its full value is realized. Also to seek feedback proactively (and knowing how to make the most of what you hear), means you'll never dread receiving it again.

 

We are pleased to inform that you have been nominated to attend the Giving & Receiving Feedback workshop. The dates for the upcoming sessions are below for your information. Please choose which session is more convenient for you and respond to @MaryAnn Derequito <mailto:Maryann.Derequito@chalhoub.com>  or @Francesca Ortaliz <mailto:Francesca.Ortaliz@chalhoub.com>  with your selected date latest 4th October 2024. Kindly note that there are limited seats available for each session and we can only accommodate max of 35 attendees per session. We will be releasing additional sessions soon in case you will miss the below dates.

 

SESSION 1: October 10, 2024 ; 12pm – 3pm (UAE Time)

SESSION 2: October 28, 2024 ; 10am – 1pm (UAE Time)

Delivery Mode: Zoom (Online)

 

We look forward to receiving your preferred date to attend the training. Further details related to the workshop will be sent to you once we received your confirmation.

 

With you @ Heart

Following the below email, please find additional date for your reference. Please send your preferred date to @MaryAnn Derequito <mailto:Maryann.Derequito@chalhoub.com>  or @Francesca Ortaliz <mailto:Francesca.Ortaliz@chalhoub.com>  latest 4th October 2024.

 

SESSION 1: October 10, 2024 ; 12pm – 3pm (UAE Time)

SESSION 2: October 28, 2024 ; 10am – 1pm (UAE Time)

SESSION 3: October 21, 2024 ; 10am – 1pm (UAE Time)

Cc: Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com>; Yara Baghdad <Yara.Baghdad@chalhoub.com>; Rawan Albina <Rawan.Albina@chalhoub.com>; Tarneem Mohamed <Tarneem.Mohamed@chalhoub.com>; Krastin Draganov <Krastin.Draganov@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Giving and Receiving Training - October

 

Dear All,

 

Hope you are well.

 

Research has shown that when done right, feedback has the power to transform performance by 39%. This fantastic feedback (constructive or otherwise) requires the right type of preparation, delivery, and in-the-moment management to ensure its full value is realized. Also to seek feedback proactively (and knowing how to make the most of what you hear), means you'll never dread receiving it again.

 

We are pleased to inform that you have been nominated to attend the Giving & Receiving Feedback workshop. The dates for the upcoming sessions are below for your information. Please choose which session is more convenient for you and respond to @MaryAnn Derequito <mailto:Maryann.Derequito@chalhoub.com>  or @Francesca Ortaliz <mailto:Francesca.Ortaliz@chalhoub.com>  with your selected date latest 4th October 2024. Kindly note that there are limited seats available for each session and we can only accommodate max of 35 attendees per session. We will be releasing additional sessions soon in case you will miss the below dates.

We look forward to receiving your preferred date to attend the training. Further details related to the workshop will be sent to you once we received your confirmation.

 

With you @ Heart
